field.label: Name
field.help: Enter a directory name for the Onion service. It may consist of lowercase and uppercase characters.

field.label: Authorization type
field.help: The type can either be 'Basic' for a general-purpose authorization protocol or 'Stealth' for a less scalable protocol that also hides service activity from unauthorized clients.

field.label: Authorized clients
field.help: If configured, only clients that are listed here are authorized to access the Onion service.
